content: this listing is for a very easy to crochet hexagon cardigan pattern it is very easy to follow pattern with plenty of photos this crochet cardigan features a simple hexagon granny hexagon design a lovely and elegant belt and a kimono inspired shape with wide sleeves and tapered waist this pattern is 11 pages long and features in depth explanations lots of photos and a link to the full length video tutorial it is written in us terms with british terms in brackets this crochet cardigan is slightly oversized this is a very inclusive pattern with sizes ranging from s to xxxl for this project you will need 2 skeins sizes xs/s 3 skeins sizes m/l/xl 4 skeins sizes xxl/xxxl of mandala yarn by lion brand in shade wood nymph or a light 3/dk weight yarn of your preference 1 skein of bernat softee baby in shade antique white or a light 3/dk weight yarn of your preference a 4 5 mm crochet hook a tapestry needle a pair of scissors this pattern is very beginner friendly pattern will be available for instant download upon purchase this pattern is written in us terms british terms in brackets for extra help you can contact me by message happy crochet and thank you for stopping by
